Errors.OneField: You must enter username and password to log in.
Errors.UserNotFound: There is no user record corresponding to this identifier. The user may have been deleted.
Errors.WrongPassword: The password is invalid or the user does not have a password.
Errors.Other: There was some problem when sign in.

Errors.RegisteredUserName: There is already an account with this username.
Errors.RegisteredEmail: An account with this email already exists.
Errors.NoOlder: You must be of legal age.
Errors.Other: There was a problem when registering.
